00078 ToolEffects::ToolEffects(Micropolis *mpolis)
00079 {
00080     this->sim = mpolis;
00081 
00082     this->clear();
00083 }
00084 
00085 ToolEffects::~ToolEffects()
00086 {
00087     /* free all frontend messages */
00088     while(!this->frontendMessages.empty()) {
00089         delete this->frontendMessages.back();
00090         this->frontendMessages.pop_back();
00091     }
00092 }
00093 
00095 void ToolEffects::clear()
00096 {
00097     this->cost = 0;
00098     this->modifications.clear();
00099 
00100     /* free all frontend messages */
00101     while(!this->frontendMessages.empty()) {
00102         delete this->frontendMessages.back();
00103         this->frontendMessages.pop_back();
00104     }
00105 }
00106 
00113 void ToolEffects::modifyWorld()
00114 {
00115     WorldModificationsMap::const_iterator modIter;
00116     FrontendMessages::const_iterator msgIter;
00117     Micropolis *mpolis = this->sim;
00118 
00119     mpolis->spend(this->cost); // Spend the costs
00120     mpolis->updateFunds();
00121 
00122     /* Modify the world. */
00123     for (modIter = this->modifications.begin();
00124                     modIter != this->modifications.end(); modIter++) {
00125         Position pos(modIter->first);
00126         mpolis->map[pos.posX][pos.posY] = modIter->second;
00127     }
00128 
00129     /* And finally send the messages. */
00130     for (msgIter = this->frontendMessages.begin();
00131                     msgIter != this->frontendMessages.end(); msgIter++) {
00132         (*msgIter)->sendMessage(mpolis);
00133     }
00134 
00135     this->clear();
00136 }
00137 
00144 bool ToolEffects::modifyIfEnoughFunding()
00145 {
00146     if (this->sim->totalFunds < this->cost) {
00147         return false; // Not enough money
00148     }
00149 
00150     this->modifyWorld();
00151     return true;
00152 }
00153 
00161 MapValue ToolEffects::getMapValue(const Position &pos) const
00162 {
00163     WorldModificationsMap::const_iterator iter;
00164 
00165     iter = this->modifications.find(pos);
00166     if (iter == this->modifications.end()) {
00167         return this->sim->map[pos.posX][pos.posY];
00168     }
00169 
00170     return (*iter).second;
00171 }
00172 
00178 void ToolEffects::setMapValue(const Position &pos, MapValue mapVal)
00179 {
00180     this->modifications[pos] = mapVal;
00181 }

00208 static const short gCostOf[] = {
00209      100,    100,    100,    500, /* res, com, ind, fire */
00210      500,      0,      5,      1, /* police, query, wire, bulldozer */
00211       20,     10,   5000,     10, /* rail, road, stadium, park */
00212     3000,   3000,   5000,  10000, /* seaport, coal, nuclear, airport */
00213      100,      0,      0,      0, /* network, water, land, forest */
00214        0,
00215 };
00216 
00222 static const short gToolSize[] = {
00223     3, 3, 3, 3,
00224     3, 1, 1, 1,
00225     1, 1, 4, 1,
00226     4, 4, 4, 6,
00227     1, 1, 1, 1,
00228     0,
00229 };

00244 ToolResult Micropolis::putDownPark(short mapH, short mapV, ToolEffects *effects)
00245 {
00246     short value = getRandom(4);
00247     MapValue tile = BURNBIT | BULLBIT;
00248 
00249     if (value == 4) {
00250         tile |= FOUNTAIN | ANIMBIT;
00251     } else {
00252         tile |= value + WOODS2;
00253     }
00254 
00255     if (effects->getMapValue(mapH, mapV) != DIRT) {
00256         return TOOLRESULT_NEED_BULLDOZE;
00257     }
00258 
00259     effects->addCost(gCostOf[TOOL_PARK]);
00260     effects->setMapValue(mapH, mapV, tile);
00261 
00262     return TOOLRESULT_OK;
00263 }
00264 
00265 
00274 ToolResult Micropolis::putDownNetwork(short mapH, short mapV,
00275                                       ToolEffects *effects)
00276 {
00277     MapTile tile = effects->getMapTile(mapH, mapV);
00278 
00279     if (tile != DIRT && tally(tile)) {
00280         effects->addCost(gCostOf[TOOL_BULLDOZER]);
00281         effects->setMapValue(mapH, mapV, DIRT);
00282         tile = DIRT;
00283     }
00284 
00285     if (tile != DIRT) return TOOLRESULT_NEED_BULLDOZE;
00286 
00287     effects->setMapValue(mapH, mapV,
00288                          TELEBASE | CONDBIT | BURNBIT | BULLBIT | ANIMBIT);
00289 
00290     effects->addCost(gCostOf[TOOL_NETWORK]);
00291 
00292     return TOOLRESULT_OK;
00293 }
00294

00302 ToolResult Micropolis::putDownWater(short mapH, short mapV,
00303                                     ToolEffects *effects)
00304 {
00305     MapTile tile = effects->getMapTile(mapH, mapV);
00306 
00307     if (tile == RIVER) return TOOLRESULT_FAILED;
00308 
00309     effects->setMapValue(mapH, mapV, RIVER);
00310 
00311     effects->addCost(gCostOf[TOOL_WATER]);
00312 
00313     return TOOLRESULT_OK;
00314 }

00350 
00358 ToolResult Micropolis::putDownForest(short mapH, short mapV,
00359                                      ToolEffects *effects)
00360 {
00361     static short dx[8] = { -1,  0,  1, -1, 1, -1,  0,  1, };
00362     static short dy[8] = { -1, -1, -1,  0, 0,  1,  1,  1, };
00363 
00364     effects->setMapValue(mapH, mapV, WOODS | BLBNBIT);
00365 
00366     int i;
00367     for (i = 0; i < 8; i++) {
00368         int xx = mapH + dx[i];
00369         int yy = mapV + dy[i];
00370         if (testBounds(xx, yy)) {
00371             smoothTreesAt(xx, yy, true, effects);
00372         }
00373     }
00374 
00375     effects->addCost(gCostOf[TOOL_FOREST]);
00376 
00377     return TOOLRESULT_OK;
00378 }

00394 static short checkBigZone(MapTile id, short *deltaHPtr, short *deltaVPtr)
00395 {
00396     switch (id) {
00397 
00398     case POWERPLANT:      /* check coal plant */
00399     case PORT:            /* check sea port */
00400     case NUCLEAR:         /* check nuc plant */
00401     case STADIUM:         /* check stadium */
00402         *deltaHPtr = 0;
00403         *deltaVPtr = 0;
00404         return 4;
00405 
00406     case POWERPLANT + 1:  /* check coal plant */
00407     case COALSMOKE3:      /* check coal plant, smoke */
00408     case COALSMOKE3 + 1:  /* check coal plant, smoke */
00409     case COALSMOKE3 + 2:  /* check coal plant, smoke */
00410     case PORT + 1:        /* check sea port */
00411     case NUCLEAR + 1:     /* check nuc plant */
00412     case STADIUM + 1:     /* check stadium */
00413         *deltaHPtr = -1;
00414         *deltaVPtr = 0;
00415         return 4;
00416 
00417     case POWERPLANT + 4:  /* check coal plant */
00418     case PORT + 4:        /* check sea port */
00419     case NUCLEAR + 4:     /* check nuc plant */
00420     case STADIUM + 4:     /* check stadium */
00421         *deltaHPtr = 0;
00422         *deltaVPtr = -1;
00423         return 4;
00424 
00425     case POWERPLANT + 5:  /* check coal plant */
00426     case PORT + 5:        /* check sea port */
00427     case NUCLEAR + 5:     /* check nuc plant */
00428     case STADIUM + 5:     /* check stadium */
00429         *deltaHPtr = -1;
00430         *deltaVPtr = -1;
00431         return 4;
00432 
00433     case AIRPORT:         /* check airport */
00434         *deltaHPtr = 0;
00435         *deltaVPtr = 0;
00436         return 6;
00437 
00438     case AIRPORT + 1:
00439         *deltaHPtr = -1;
00440         *deltaVPtr = 0;
00441         return 6;
00442 
00443     case AIRPORT + 2:
00444         *deltaHPtr = -2;
00445         *deltaVPtr = 0;
00446         return 6;
00447 
00448     case AIRPORT + 3:
00449         *deltaHPtr = -3;
00450         *deltaVPtr = 0;
00451         return 6;
00452 
00453     case AIRPORT + 6:
00454         *deltaHPtr = 0;
00455         *deltaVPtr = -1;
00456         return 6;
00457 
00458     case AIRPORT + 7:
00459         *deltaHPtr = -1;
00460         *deltaVPtr = -1;
00461         return 6;
00462 
00463     case AIRPORT + 8:
00464         *deltaHPtr = -2;
00465         *deltaVPtr = -1;
00466         return 6;
00467 
00468     case AIRPORT + 9:
00469         *deltaHPtr = -3;
00470         *deltaVPtr = -1;
00471         return 6;
00472 
00473     case AIRPORT + 12:
00474         *deltaHPtr = 0;
00475         *deltaVPtr = -2;
00476         return 6;
00477 
00478     case AIRPORT + 13:
00479         *deltaHPtr = -1;
00480         *deltaVPtr = -2;
00481         return 6;
00482 
00483     case AIRPORT + 14:
00484         *deltaHPtr = -2;
00485         *deltaVPtr = -2;
00486         return 6;
00487 
00488     case AIRPORT + 15:
00489         *deltaHPtr = -3;
00490         *deltaVPtr = -2;
00491         return 6;
00492 
00493     case AIRPORT + 18:
00494         *deltaHPtr = 0;
00495         *deltaVPtr = -3;
00496         return 6;
00497 
00498     case AIRPORT + 19:
00499         *deltaHPtr = -1;
00500         *deltaVPtr = -3;
00501         return 6;
00502 
00503     case AIRPORT + 20:
00504         *deltaHPtr = -2;
00505         *deltaVPtr = -3;
00506         return 6;
00507 
00508     case AIRPORT + 21:
00509         *deltaHPtr = -3;
00510         *deltaVPtr = -3;
00511         return 6;
00512 
00513     default:
00514         *deltaHPtr = 0;
00515         *deltaVPtr = 0;
00516         return 0;
00517 
00518     }
00519 }

00521 
00527 bool Micropolis::tally(short tileValue)
00528 {
00529     return (tileValue >= FIRSTRIVEDGE  && tileValue <= LASTRUBBLE) ||
00530            (tileValue >= POWERBASE + 2 && tileValue <= POWERBASE + 12) ||
00531            (tileValue >= TINYEXP       && tileValue <= LASTTINYEXP + 2);
00532 }
00533 
00534 
00540 short Micropolis::checkSize(short tileValue)
00541 {
00542     // check for the normal com, resl, ind 3x3 zones & the fireDept & PoliceDept
00543     if ((tileValue >= RESBASE - 1        && tileValue <= PORTBASE - 1) ||
00544         (tileValue >= LASTPOWERPLANT + 1 && tileValue <= POLICESTATION + 4) ||
00545         (tileValue >= CHURCH1BASE && tileValue <= CHURCH7LAST)) {
00546         return 3;
00547     }
00548 
00549     if ((tileValue >= PORTBASE    && tileValue <= LASTPORT) ||
00550         (tileValue >= COALBASE    && tileValue <= LASTPOWERPLANT) ||
00551         (tileValue >= STADIUMBASE && tileValue <= LASTZONE)) {
00552         return 4;
00553     }
00554 
00555     return 0;
00556 }
00557 
00558 
00567 void Micropolis::checkBorder(short xMap, short yMap, int sizeX, int sizeY,
00568                              ToolEffects *effects)
00569 {
00570     short cnt;
00571 
00572     /* this will do the upper bordering row */
00573     for (cnt = 0; cnt < sizeX; cnt++) {
00574         connectTile(xMap + cnt, yMap - 1, CONNECT_TILE_FIX, effects);
00575     }
00576 
00577     /* this will do the left bordering row */
00578     for (cnt = 0; cnt < sizeY; cnt++) {
00579         connectTile(xMap - 1, yMap + cnt, CONNECT_TILE_FIX, effects);
00580     }
00581 
00582     /* this will do the bottom bordering row */
00583     for (cnt = 0; cnt < sizeX; cnt++) {
00584         connectTile(xMap + cnt, yMap + sizeY, CONNECT_TILE_FIX, effects);
00585     }
00586 
00587     /* this will do the right bordering row */
00588     for (cnt = 0; cnt < sizeY; cnt++) {
00589         connectTile(xMap + sizeX, yMap + cnt, CONNECT_TILE_FIX, effects);
00590     }
00591 }
00592 
00609 void Micropolis::putBuilding(int leftX, int topY, int sizeX, int sizeY,
00610                              MapTile baseTile, bool aniFlag,
00611                              ToolEffects *effects)
00612 {
00613     for (int dy = 0; dy < sizeY; dy++) {
00614         int posY = topY + dy;
00615 
00616         for (int dx = 0; dx < sizeX; dx++) {
00617             int posX = leftX + dx;
00618 
00619             MapValue tileValue = baseTile | BNCNBIT;
00620             if (dx == 1) {
00621                 if (dy == 1) {
00622                     tileValue |= ZONEBIT;
00623                 } else if (dy == 2 && aniFlag) {
00624                     tileValue |= ANIMBIT;
00625                 }
00626             }
00627 
00628             effects->setMapValue(posX, posY, tileValue);
00629 
00630             baseTile++;
00631         }
00632     }
00633 }
00634 
00649 ToolResult Micropolis::prepareBuildingSite(int leftX, int topY,
00650                                            int sizeX, int sizeY,
00651                                            ToolEffects *effects)
00652 {
00653     // Check that the entire site is on the map
00654     if (leftX < 0 || leftX + sizeX > WORLD_W) {
00655         return TOOLRESULT_FAILED;
00656     }
00657     if (topY < 0 || topY + sizeY > WORLD_H) {
00658         return TOOLRESULT_FAILED;
00659     }
00660 
00661     // Check whether the tiles are clear
00662     for (int dy = 0; dy < sizeY; dy++) {
00663         int posY = topY + dy;
00664 
00665         for (int dx = 0; dx < sizeX; dx++) {
00666             int posX = leftX + dx;
00667 
00668             unsigned short tileValue = effects->getMapTile(posX, posY);
00669 
00670             if (tileValue == DIRT) { // DIRT tile is buidable
00671                 continue;
00672             }
00673 
00674             if (!autoBulldoze) {
00675                 // No DIRT and no bull-dozer => not buildable
00676                 return TOOLRESULT_NEED_BULLDOZE;
00677             }
00678             if (!tally(tileValue)) {
00679                 // tilevalue cannot be auto-bulldozed
00680                 return TOOLRESULT_NEED_BULLDOZE;
00681             }
00682 
00683             effects->setMapValue(posX, posY, DIRT);
00684             effects->addCost(gCostOf[TOOL_BULLDOZER]);
00685         }
00686     }
00687 
00688     return TOOLRESULT_OK;
00689 }
00690 
00691 
00703 ToolResult Micropolis::buildBuilding(int mapH, int mapV,
00704                                      const BuildingProperties *buildingProps,
00705                                      ToolEffects *effects)
00706 {
00707     mapH--; mapV--; // Move position to top-left
00708 
00709     ToolResult prepareResult = prepareBuildingSite(mapH, mapV,
00710                                                 buildingProps->sizeX,
00711                                                 buildingProps->sizeY,
00712                                                 effects);
00713     if (prepareResult != TOOLRESULT_OK) {
00714         return prepareResult;
00715     }
00716 
00717     /* Preparation was ok, put down the building. */
00718     effects->addCost(gCostOf[buildingProps->tool]);
00719 
00720     putBuilding(mapH, mapV, buildingProps->sizeX, buildingProps->sizeY,
00721                 buildingProps->baseTile, buildingProps->buildingIsAnimated,
00722                 effects);
00723 
00724     checkBorder(mapH, mapV,
00725                 buildingProps->sizeX, buildingProps->sizeY,
00726                 effects);
00727 
00728     return TOOLRESULT_OK;
00729 }

00734 /* search table for zone status string match */
00735 static short idArray[29] = {
00736     DIRT, RIVER, TREEBASE, RUBBLE,
00737     FLOOD, RADTILE, FIRE, ROADBASE,
00738     POWERBASE, RAILBASE, RESBASE, COMBASE,
00739     INDBASE, PORTBASE, AIRPORTBASE, COALBASE,
00740     FIRESTBASE, POLICESTBASE, STADIUMBASE, NUCLEARBASE,
00741     // FIXME: I think HBRDG_END should be HBRDG0...?
00742     HBRDG0, RADAR0, FOUNTAIN, INDBASE2,
00743     // FIXME: What are tiles 952 and 956?
00744     FOOTBALLGAME1, VBRDG0, 952, 956,
00745     9999, // a huge short
00746 };
00747 
00748 /*
00749     0, 2, 21, 44,
00750     48, 52, 53, 64,
00751     208, 224, 240, 423,
00752     612, 693, 709, 745,
00753     761, 770, 779, 811,
00754     827, 832, 840, 844,
00755     932, 948, 952, 956
00756 
00757     Clear, Water, Trees, Rubble,
00758     Flood, Radioactive Waste, Fire, Road,
00759     Power, Rail, Residential, Commercial,
00760     Industrial, Port, AirPort, Coal Power,
00761     Fire Department, Police Department, Stadium, Nuclear Power,
00762     Draw Bridge, Radar Dish, Fountain, Industrial,
00763     49er's 38  Bears 3, Draw Bridge, Ur 238, Unknown
00764 */

00766 
00780 int Micropolis::getDensityStr(short catNo, short mapH, short mapV)
00781 {
00782     int z;
00783 
00784     switch (catNo) {
00785 
00786     case 0:
00787     default:
00788         z = populationDensityMap.worldGet(mapH, mapV);
00789         z = z >> 6;
00790         z = z & 3;
00791         return z + STR202_POPULATIONDENSITY_LOW;
00792 
00793     case 1:
00794         z = landValueMap.worldGet(mapH, mapV);
00795         if (z < 30) return STR202_LANDVALUE_SLUM;
00796         if (z < 80) return STR202_LANDVALUE_LOWER_CLASS;
00797         if (z < 150) return STR202_LANDVALUE_MIDDLE_CLASS;
00798         return STR202_LANDVALUE_HIGH_CLASS;
00799 
00800     case 2:
00801         z = crimeRateMap.worldGet(mapH, mapV);
00802         z = z >> 6;
00803         z = z & 3;
00804         return z + STR202_CRIME_NONE;
00805 
00806     case 3:
00807         z = pollutionDensityMap.worldGet(mapH, mapV);
00808         if (z < 64 && z > 0) return 13;
00809         z = z >> 6;
00810         z = z & 3;
00811         return z + STR202_POLLUTION_NONE;
00812 
00813     case 4:
00814         z = rateOfGrowthMap.worldGet(mapH, mapV);
00815         if (z < 0) return STR202_GROWRATE_DECLINING;
00816         if (z == 0) return STR202_GROWRATE_STABLE;
00817         if (z > 100) return STR202_GROWRATE_FASTGROWTH;
00818         return STR202_GROWRATE_SLOWGROWTH;
00819 
00820     }
00821 }
00822 
00823 
00830 void Micropolis::doZoneStatus(short mapH, short mapV)
00831 {
00832     char localStr[256]; // Textual version of the category the tile belongs to
00833     char statusStr[5][256];
00834 
00835     short tileNum = map[mapH][mapV] & LOMASK;
00836 
00837     if (tileNum >= COALSMOKE1 && tileNum < FOOTBALLGAME1) {
00838       tileNum = COALBASE;
00839     }
00840 
00841     // Find the category where the tile belongs to
00842     // Note: If 'tileNum < idArray[i]', it belongs to category i-1
00843     short i;
00844     for (i = 1; i < 29; i++) {
00845         if (tileNum < idArray[i]) {
00846             break;
00847         }
00848     }
00849 
00850     i--;
00851     // i contains the category that the tile belongs to (in theory 0..27).
00852     // However, it is 0..26, since 956 is the first unused tile
00853 
00854     // Code below looks buggy, 0 is a valid value (namely 'dirt'), and upper
00855     // limit is not correctly checked either ('stri.219' has only 27 lines).
00856 
00857     // FIXME: This is strange... Normalize to zero based index.
00858     if (i < 1 || i > 28) {
00859       i = 28;  // This breaks the program (when you click 'dirt')
00860     }
00861 
00862     // Obtain the string of the tile category.
00863     // 'stri.219' has only 27 lines, so 0 <= i <= 26 is acceptable.
00864     getIndString(localStr, 219, i + 1);
00865 
00866     for (i = 0; i < 5; i++) {
00867         short id = clamp(getDensityStr(i, mapH, mapV) + 1, 1, 20);
00868         getIndString(statusStr[i], 202, id);
00869     }
00870 
00871     doShowZoneStatus(
00872         localStr, 
00873         statusStr[0], statusStr[1], statusStr[2],
00874         statusStr[3], statusStr[4], 
00875         mapH, mapV);
00876 }
00877 
00878 
00889 void Micropolis::doShowZoneStatus(
00890     char *str,
00891     char *s0, char *s1, char *s2, char *s3, char *s4,
00892     int x, int y)
00893 {
00894     callback("showZoneStatus", "ssssssdd", str, s0, s1, s2, s3, s4, x, y);
00895 }
00896 
00897 
00904 void Micropolis::putRubble(int x, int y, int size, ToolEffects *effects)
00905 {
00906     for (int xx = x; xx < x + size; xx++) {
00907         for (int yy = y; yy < y + size; yy++)  {
00908 
00909             if (testBounds(xx, yy)) {
00910                 int tile = effects->getMapTile(xx, yy);
00911 
00912                 if (tile != RADTILE && tile != DIRT) {
00913                     tile = (doAnimation ? (TINYEXP + getRandom(2)) : SOMETINYEXP);
00914                     effects->setMapValue(xx, yy, tile | ANIMBIT | BULLBIT);
00915                 }
00916             }
00917         }
00918     }
00919 }
00920 
00921 
00928 void Micropolis::didTool(const char *name, short x, short y)
00929 {
00930     callback("didTool", "sdd", name, (int)x, (int)y);
00931 }

00944 ToolResult Micropolis::queryTool(short x, short y)
00945 {
00946     if (!testBounds(x, y)) {
00947         return TOOLRESULT_FAILED;
00948     }
00949 
00950     doZoneStatus(x, y);
00951     didTool("Qry", x, y);
00952 
00953     return TOOLRESULT_OK;
00954 }

00956 ToolResult Micropolis::bulldozerTool(short x, short y)
00957 {
00958     ToolEffects effects(this);
00959 
00960     ToolResult result = bulldozerTool(x, y, &effects);
00961 
00962     if (result == TOOLRESULT_OK) {
00963         effects.modifyWorld();
00964     }
00965 
00966     return result;
00967 }
00968 
00982 ToolResult Micropolis::bulldozerTool(short x, short y, ToolEffects *effects)
00983 {
00984     ToolResult result = TOOLRESULT_OK;
00985 
00986     if (!testBounds(x, y)) {
00987         return TOOLRESULT_FAILED;
00988     }
00989 
00990     MapValue mapVal = effects->getMapValue(x, y);
00991     MapTile tile = mapVal & LOMASK;
00992 
00993     short zoneSize = 0; // size of the zone, 0 means invalid.
00994     short deltaH; // Amount of horizontal shift to the center tile of the zone.
00995     short deltaV; // Amount of vertical shift to the center tile of the zone.
00996     FrontendMessage *frontendMsg;
00997 
00998     if (mapVal & ZONEBIT) { /* zone center bit is set */
00999         zoneSize = checkSize(tile);
01000         deltaH = 0;
01001         deltaV = 0;
01002     } else {
01003         zoneSize = checkBigZone(tile, &deltaH, &deltaV);
01004     }
01005 
01006     if (zoneSize > 0) {
01007         effects->addCost(gCostOf[TOOL_BULLDOZER]);
01008 
01009         int dozeX = x;
01010         int dozeY = y;
01011         int centerX = x + deltaH;
01012         int centerY = y + deltaV;
01013 
01014         switch (zoneSize) {
01015 
01016         case 3:
01017             frontendMsg = new FrontendMessageMakeSound(
01018                                 "city", "Explosion-High", dozeX, dozeY);
01019             effects->addFrontendMessage(frontendMsg);
01020 
01021             putRubble(centerX - 1, centerY - 1, 3, effects);
01022             break;
01023 
01024         case 4:
01025             frontendMsg = new FrontendMessageMakeSound(
01026                                 "city", "Explosion-Low", dozeX, dozeY);
01027             effects->addFrontendMessage(frontendMsg);
01028 
01029             putRubble(centerX - 1, centerY - 1, 4, effects);
01030             break;
01031 
01032         case 6:
01033             frontendMsg = new FrontendMessageMakeSound(
01034                                 "city", "Explosion-High", dozeX, dozeY);
01035             effects->addFrontendMessage(frontendMsg);
01036 
01037             frontendMsg = new FrontendMessageMakeSound(
01038                                 "city", "Explosion-Low", dozeX, dozeY);
01039             effects->addFrontendMessage(frontendMsg);
01040 
01041             putRubble(centerX - 1, centerY - 1, 6, effects);
01042             break;
01043 
01044         default:
01045             NOT_REACHED();
01046             break;
01047 
01048         }
01049 
01050 
01051         if (result == TOOLRESULT_OK) {
01052             /* send 'didtool' message */
01053             frontendMsg = new FrontendMessageDidTool("Dozr", x, y);
01054             effects->addFrontendMessage(frontendMsg);
01055         }
01056 
01057         return result;
01058 
01059     }
01060 
01061 
01062     if (tile == RIVER || tile == REDGE || tile == CHANNEL) {
01063 
01064         result = connectTile(x, y, CONNECT_TILE_BULLDOZE, effects);
01065 
01066         if (tile != effects->getMapTile(x, y)) {
01067             effects->addCost(5);
01068         }
01069     } else {
01070         result = connectTile(x, y, CONNECT_TILE_BULLDOZE, effects);
01071     }
01072 
01073     if (result == TOOLRESULT_OK) {
01074         /* send 'didtool' message */
01075         frontendMsg = new FrontendMessageDidTool("Dozr", x, y);
01076         didTool("Dozr", x, y);
01077         effects->addFrontendMessage(frontendMsg);
01078     }
01079 
01080     return result;
01081 }
01082

01197 ToolResult Micropolis::buildBuildingTool(short x, short y,
01198                                     const BuildingProperties *buildingProps,
01199                                     ToolEffects *effects)
01200 {
01201     ToolResult result = buildBuilding(x, y, buildingProps, effects);
01202 
01203     if (result == TOOLRESULT_OK) {
01204         /* send 'didtool' message */
01205         FrontendMessage *didToolMsg;
01206         didToolMsg = new FrontendMessageDidTool(buildingProps->toolName, x, y);
01207         effects->addFrontendMessage(didToolMsg);
01208     }
01209 
01210     return result;
01211 }

01243     BuildingProperties(4, 4, NUCLEARBASE, TOOL_NUCLEARPOWER, "Nuc", true);

01247     BuildingProperties(4, 4, PORTBASE, TOOL_SEAPORT, "Seap", false);

01251     BuildingProperties(6, 6, AIRPORTBASE, TOOL_AIRPORT, "Airp", false);

01277 ToolResult Micropolis::waterTool(short x, short y, ToolEffects *effects)

01284

01286         result = putDownWater(x, y, effects);
01287     }
01288 
01289     if (result == TOOLRESULT_OK) {
01290         /* send 'didtool' message */
01291         FrontendMessage *didToolMsg;
01292         didToolMsg = new FrontendMessageDidTool("Water", x, y);
01293         effects->addFrontendMessage(didToolMsg);
01294     }
01295 
01296     return result;

01311

01321 
01322 
01323 ToolResult Micropolis::forestTool(short x, short y, ToolEffects *effects)
01324 {
01325     ToolResult result = TOOLRESULT_OK;
01326 
01327     if (!testBounds(x, y)) {
01328         return TOOLRESULT_FAILED;
01329     }
01330 
01331     MapValue tile = effects->getMapValue(x, y);
01332 
01333     if (isTree(tile)) {
01334         return TOOLRESULT_OK;
01335     }
01336 
01337     if ((tile & LOMASK) != DIRT) {
01339         result = bulldozerTool(x, y, effects);
01340     }
01341 
01342     tile = effects->getMapValue(x, y);
01343 
01344     if (tile == DIRT) {
01345         result = putDownForest(x, y, effects);
01346 
01347         if (result == TOOLRESULT_OK) {
01348             /* send 'didtool' message */
01349             FrontendMessage *didToolMsg;
01350             didToolMsg = new FrontendMessageDidTool("Forest", x, y);
01351             effects->addFrontendMessage(didToolMsg);
01352         }
01353 
01354     } else {
01355         result = TOOLRESULT_FAILED;
01356     }
01357 
01358     return result;
01359 }
01360 
01361 
01369 ToolResult Micropolis::doTool(EditingTool tool, short tileX, short tileY)
01370 {
01371     ToolEffects effects(this);
01372     ToolResult result;
01373 
01374     switch (tool) {
01375 
01376     case TOOL_RESIDENTIAL:
01377         result = buildBuildingTool(tileX, tileY, &residentialZoneBuilding,
01378                                    &effects);
01379         break;
01380 
01381     case TOOL_COMMERCIAL:
01382         result = buildBuildingTool(tileX, tileY, &commercialZoneBuilding,
01383                                    &effects);
01384         break;
01385 
01386     case TOOL_INDUSTRIAL:
01387         result = buildBuildingTool(tileX, tileY, &industrialZoneBuilding,
01388                                    &effects);
01389         break;
01390 
01391     case TOOL_FIRESTATION:
01392         result = buildBuildingTool(tileX, tileY, &fireStationBuilding,
01393                                    &effects);
01394         break;
01395 
01396     case TOOL_POLICESTATION:
01397         result = buildBuildingTool(tileX, tileY, &policeStationBuilding,
01398                                    &effects);
01399         break;
01400 
01401     case TOOL_QUERY:
01402         return queryTool(tileX, tileY);
01403 
01404     case TOOL_WIRE:
01405         result = wireTool(tileX, tileY, &effects);
01406         break;
01407 
01408     case TOOL_BULLDOZER:
01409         result = bulldozerTool(tileX, tileY, &effects);
01410         break;
01411 
01412     case TOOL_RAILROAD:
01413         result = railroadTool(tileX, tileY, &effects);
01414         break;
01415 
01416     case TOOL_ROAD:
01417         result = roadTool(tileX, tileY, &effects);
01418         break;
01419 
01420     case TOOL_STADIUM:
01421         result = buildBuildingTool(tileX, tileY, &stadiumBuilding,
01422                                    &effects);
01423         break;
01424 
01425     case TOOL_PARK:
01426         result = parkTool(tileX, tileY, &effects);
01427         break;
01428 
01429     case TOOL_SEAPORT:
01430         result = buildBuildingTool(tileX, tileY, &seaportBuilding,
01431                                    &effects);
01432         break;
01433 
01434     case TOOL_COALPOWER:
01435         result = buildBuildingTool(tileX, tileY, &coalPowerBuilding,
01436                                    &effects);
01437         break;
01438 
01439     case TOOL_NUCLEARPOWER:
01440         result = buildBuildingTool(tileX, tileY, &nuclearPowerBuilding,
01441                                    &effects);
01442         break;
01443 
01444     case TOOL_AIRPORT:
01445         result = buildBuildingTool(tileX, tileY, &airportBuilding,
01446                                    &effects);
01447         break;
01448 
01449     case TOOL_NETWORK:
01450         result = networkTool(tileX, tileY, &effects);
01451         break;
01452 
01453     case TOOL_WATER:
01454         result = waterTool(tileX, tileY, &effects);
01455         break;
01456 
01457     case TOOL_LAND:
01458         result = landTool(tileX, tileY, &effects);
01459         break;
01460 
01461     case TOOL_FOREST:
01462         result = forestTool(tileX, tileY, &effects);
01463         break;
01464 
01465     default:
01466         return TOOLRESULT_FAILED;
01467 
01468     }
01469 
01470     // Perform the effects of applying the tool if enough funds.
01471     if (result == TOOLRESULT_OK) {
01472         if (!effects.modifyIfEnoughFunding()) {
01473             return TOOLRESULT_NO_MONEY;
01474         }
01475     }
01476 
01477     return result;
01478 }
01479 
01480 
01481 void Micropolis::toolDown(EditingTool tool, short tileX, short tileY)
01482 {
01483     ToolResult result = doTool(tool, tileX, tileY);
01484 
01485     if (result == TOOLRESULT_NEED_BULLDOZE) {
01486         sendMessage(MESSAGE_BULLDOZE_AREA_FIRST, NOWHERE, NOWHERE, false, true);
01489         makeSound("interface", "UhUh", tileX <<4, tileY <<4);
01490 
01491     } else if (result == TOOLRESULT_NO_MONEY) {
01492         sendMessage(MESSAGE_NOT_ENOUGH_FUNDS, NOWHERE, NOWHERE, false, true);
01495         makeSound("interface", "Sorry", tileX <<4, tileY <<4);
01496     }
01497 
01498     simPass = 0;
01499     invalidateMaps();
01500 }
01501 
01510 void Micropolis::toolDrag(EditingTool tool,
01511                             short fromX, short fromY, short toX, short toY)
01512 {
01513     // Do not drag big tools.
01514     int toolSize = gToolSize[tool];
01515     if (toolSize > 1) {
01516         doTool(tool, toX, toY);
01517 
01518         simPass = 0; // update editors overlapping this one
01519         invalidateMaps();
01520         return;
01521     }
01522 
01523     short dirX = (toX > fromX) ? 1 : -1; // Horizontal step direction.
01524     short dirY = (toY > fromY) ? 1 : -1; // Vertical step direction.
01525 
01526 
01527     if (fromX == toX && fromY == toY) {
01528         return;
01529     }
01530 
01531     doTool(tool, fromX, fromY); // Ensure the start position is done.
01532 
01533     // Vertical line up or down
01534     if (fromX == toX && fromY != toY) {
01535 
01536         while (fromY != toY) {
01537             fromY += dirY;
01538             doTool(tool, fromX, fromY);
01539         }
01540 
01541         simPass = 0; // update editors overlapping this one
01542         invalidateMaps();
01543         return;
01544     }
01545 
01546     // Horizontal line left/right
01547     if (fromX != toX && fromY == toY) {
01548 
01549         while (fromX != toX) {
01550             fromX += dirX;
01551             doTool(tool, fromX, fromY);
01552         }
01553 
01554         simPass = 0; // update editors overlapping this one
01555         invalidateMaps();
01556         return;
01557     }
01558 
01559     // General case: both X and Y change.
01560 
01561     short dx = absoluteValue(fromX - toX); // number of horizontal steps.
01562     short dy = absoluteValue(fromY - toY); // number of vertical steps.
01563 
01564     short subX = 0; // Each X step is dy sub-steps.
01565     short subY = 0; // Each Y step is dx sub-steps.
01566     short numSubsteps = min(dx, dy); // Number of sub-steps we can do.
01567 
01568     while (fromX != toX || fromY != toY) {
01569         subX += numSubsteps;
01570         if (subX >= dy) {
01571             subX -= dy;
01572             fromX += dirX;
01573             doTool(tool, fromX, fromY);
01574         }
01575 
01576         subY += numSubsteps;
01577         if (subY >= dx) {
01578             subY -= dx;
01579             fromY += dirY;
01580             doTool(tool, fromX, fromY);
01581         }
01582     }
01583 
01584     simPass = 0;
01585     invalidateMaps();
01586 }
